directions: In a heavy wok, stir-fry garlic and onion using half of the vegetable stock, until browned. Add pumpkin cubes, moisten with remaining vegetable stock and stir constantly until pumpkin is cooked. Season with soy sauce, oyster sauce and honey. Sprinkle with Thai basil leaves and sliced red chile. Serve with brown rice.
ingredients: 120 g (4 1/4 oz) onions, halved and sliced into strips
100 ml (3 1/2 fl oz/3/8 cup) Vegetable Stock
600 g (1 lb 5 oz) pumpkin, peeled and cubed
4 handfuls Thai basil leaves, to garnish
3 red chiles seeded and finely sliced, to garnish
title: Stir-Fried Pumpkin with Chiles and Basil (_Fakthong Pad Bai Horapa_)
